allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
[SUPPLIER-UX] Enforce Wolt-blue theme across all supplier pages

Replace all green color references with Wolt-blue \(#009EE0\) throughout supplier pages:
- Success/complete badges: emerald -> #009EE0/10 bg with #009EE0 text
- Resolve buttons: #00d4aa -> #009EE0 with #0088C4 hover
- Status indicators: emerald-100/600 -> #009EE0/10 with #009EE0 text
- Chart colors: #10b981, #00d4aa -> #009EE0
- Live connection indicator: emerald -> #009EE0
- Revenue icons: emerald-500 -> #009EE0
- Discrepancy rate badges: emerald -> #009EE0 \(for low rates\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
